trait.name: Tool Proficiencies
trait.text: Thieves' tools, one set of artisan's tools of your choice

trait.name: Equipment
trait.text: A holy symbol, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

trait.name: Feature: Legal Authority
trait.text: As an inquisitor of the church, you have the authority to arrest criminals. In the absence of other authorities, you are authorized to pass judgment and even carry out sentencing. If you abuse this power, however, your superiors in the church might strip it from you.
